1.0.name: wordpress/exif-remove-imagemagick
1.0.description:
The plugin affects the image while it is uploaded. Straight after it is uploaded, all Exif data will be removed from the image. There is no original image left, nor made a backup. This plugin requires the ImageMagick php modules.

Based on exif-remove by CupRacer http://www.mynakedgirlfriend.de/wordpress/exif-remove/

Uses code from imagemagick-enigine by orangelab http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/imagemagick-engine/

ATTENTION: This service is intended to save your privacy and should not be used for illegal activity like copyright violations. You are allowed to use this service for legal activity only, this includes that you must have the explicit permission from the holder of rights to clean a file with this plugin! To disable this plugin temporarily, just deactivate it within the Exif-R
